author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008217

The Alters is... Not Your Typical Survival Game. You've read that correct.
It is a unique blend of survival, adventure, and storytelling gameplay. Finding the right balance was one of the top priorities while developing the game. We wanted the gameplay to push the story forward, but also make the narrative play a significant role in the final outcome.

The Alters starts as your typical survival game, yet you quickly realize there is more to it. You need to create the Alters for their skills which will be essential to survival. At the same time, this means bringing new characters to the story and making the gameplay more complex. The same goes for base-building. What starts as a simple task of operating a functional base turns into a series of hard choices. You are tasked not only with tackling ongoing problems and pushing the mission forward. Your Alters' individual needs will also need to be taken care of. Finding the right balan
title: The Alters - Expedition Logs Episode 1: Not Your Typical Survival Game | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist Dark Mass on PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014462

Dark Mass is the first underwater horror game set inside a sunken manor, where psychological terror, immersive exploration, and survival merge in the depths of the unknown.
As Alice, a deep-sea explorer, you and your brother Reed uncover a long-forgotten wreck. But beneath it lies something far more sinister—a manor lost to time, untouched by the world above, hiding a dark curse.

Survive the horrors lurking within, solve disturbing ritualistic puzzles, and make choices that will shape your fate.

Fear sinks deeper than ever before.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games 

Rated Mature
title: Dark Mass - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EP7579-PPSA17599_00-EXP33000000PS5EU

Explore the gameplay and motivations of the key members of Expedition 33 as they set course to destroy the Paintress so she may never paint death again.  

Meet Maelle, the youngest member of the Expedition. A shy loner, eager to fly. Orphaned at age 3, Maelle has never felt at home in Lumière. She has difficulty connecting with and trusting others, but has come to appreciate her foster brother Gustave.At 16 years of age, Maelle is significantly younger than her fellow Expeditioners. Unlike them, she views the Expedition as her chance to explore the world beyond Lumière and finally forge her own destiny. 

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 will release on April 24, 2025 on Playstation 5. Pre-order now!

#ps5 #ps5games #clairobscur 

Rated Mature
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Maelle Character Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012303

The Oldest House has been taken over by an unlikely threat: Sticky Notes. Their endless replication needs to be stopped immediately but they won’t go down without a fight and the Hiss will be there to hinder you every step of the way.  

FBC: Firebreak is a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order. 

FBC: Firebreak is scheduled to release in Summer 2025 for PlayStation 5. Wishlist now!

Developed and published by Remedy Entertainment. 

#ps5 #ps5games #FBCFirebreak #Firebreak
title: FBC: Firebreak - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

Today during The MIX Spring Showcase, developer Nightdive Studios announced the official release date for System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster, available June 26, 2025 for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5!

System Shock® 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster Key Features:

• Choose from 3 branches of the Military; O.S.A, Marines or Navy and experiment with different play styles.
• Up to 120 FPS performance with ultra-widescreen support
• 50 Trophies to unlock
• Enhanced Characters, Weapon Models and Animations
• Optimized Controller support
• Quality of Life Improvements

author: PlayStation
description:
Get it now on: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010857

Wait... A muscular cat that fights aliens!?

Get ready to enjoy this crazy 2D platformer adventure starring KinnikuNeko! A cat with the body of a bodybuilder who will fight against a big alien army that has invaded planet Earth and captured all its inhabitants. He will be accompanied by his friends Lemon and Keita, who haven't yet been captured by the evil beings from outer space.

- Fun 2D platformer with different mini-games that will change the rhythm of the game. Purr like a kitty or punch with the strength of a school bus.
- Exciting story full of goofy humor, friendship, drama and action. Full of charismatic and unforgettable characters.
- Striking visual style that pays tribute to Japanese anime of the 90s.
- Awesome soundtrack that will empower your journey.
- Discover all the secrets by replaying the levels and finding the hidden objects.
- Nya nya nya nya nyaaaaaaa (meow with a button).

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4
title: KinnikuNeko: Super Muscle Cat - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Build your own dungeon and battle through it in Into the Restless Ruins, a roguelike deckbuilder inspired by Scottish folklore. Strategically place rooms and corridors, upgrade your deck, and face off against challenging creatures as you work your way through the ruins. Encounter helpful characters like the Hen Wife and the Wulver to strengthen your deck and unlock powerful boosts. The demo is available now on PS5® – try it today and prepare for the full release on May 15!

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/god-of-war-ragnarok/

Celebrate God of War’s 20th Anniversary with the Dark Odyssey collection! As a gift to everyone who owns God of War Ragnarök, on March 20th we will be releasing an update for all players on PlayStation and PC that includes the Dark Odyssey collection at no additional cost.

Inspired by the working name of God of War (2005) and the skin that originally appeared in God of War II as a reward for beating the game on God Mode difficulty, we are bringing the classic black and gold theme for the 20th anniversary. 

Once the update is live, you’ll be able access the collection below from any Lost Items chest in the base game or automatically while in Valhalla. 

*Internet connection required

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #pc #pcgames
title: God of War 20th Anniversary - Dark Odyssey Collection In-Game Cosmetics | PS5, PS4 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/atomfall/

Atomfall will launch on March 27th 2025, coming to PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4. Atomfall Deluxe Edition includes up to 3 days early access to play from 24th March 2025.

A single-player survival-action game inspired by real-life events, Atomfall is set five years after the Windscale nuclear disaster in Northern England. 

Explore the fictional quarantine zone, scavenge, craft, barter, fight and talk your way through a British countryside setting filled with bizarre characters, mysticism, cults, and rogue government agencies. 

From Rebellion, the studio behind Sniper Elite and Zombie Army, Atomfall will challenge you to solve the dark mystery of what really happened. 

• Player Driven Mystery
Unravel a tapestry of interwoven narratives through exploration, conversation, investigation, and combat, where every choice you make has consequences. 

• Explore this Green and Unpleasant Land
The picturesque British countryside, with roll
title: Atomfall - Pre-Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
